response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Given its importance, we are offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. We believe this is a fair and competitive offer considering its worth to both parties. Should you choose to accept, you'll be experiencing the unparalleled benefits of owning this product. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 14000}
